component.name: Tewi
component.summary: Text-based interface for BitTorrent clients (Transmission, qBittorrent, Deluge)

description.p: Tewi is a TUI (text user interface) for BitTorrent clients, supporting Transmission, qBittorrent and Deluge daemons.

ul.li: Connect to Transmission/qBittorrent/Deluge daemon by credentials
Browse torrents list
Different view modes: card, compact, oneline
Display torrent details: overview, files, trackers, peers
View and edit torrent categories and labels
Add new torrents
Torrent actions: start/pause, remove/trash, verify, reannounce, change priority
View and toggle alternative speed limits
View session statistics
View torrent client preferences
Dark and light color themes
Search torrents on popular trackers (built-in search providers, Jackett, Prowlarr and bitmagnet integrations)
Support for configuration files and different configuration profiles
Add --log-level CLI and config option with 5 log levels (debug, info, warning, error, critical)
Add Bitmagnet torrent search provider with GraphQL API integration
Open files from torrent details with hotkey Enter

Add --jackett-multi and --prowlarr-multi CLI and config options to control indexer loading mode: when disabled (default), shows single provider entry in search dialog and searches all indexers; when enabled, loads all indexers individually for granular selection
Search providers now respect configuration order: providers listed first in config take priority when deduplicating results and appear first in search dialog
Default search provider order set to: tpb, yts, nyaa, torrentscsv, jackett, prowlarr, bitmagnet, torrentz2
By default enable only built-in search providers
Use theme colors for file priority icons in torrent files tab
YTS provider: Strip query parameters from page URLs for cleaner links
TPB provider: fix parsing error when num_files field is missing from API response
Remove --logs CLI and config option (replaced by --log-level)
Add Prowlarr torrent search provider
Display download count in search results
Display freeleech flag in torrent search results
Add --path CLI and config option to customize RPC path for Transmission and base JSON path for Deluge
Web search now remembers last selected indexers and categories ('w' hotkey for clean search, 'W' - for using last state)
Use platformdirs library to get location for config and logs directories
Log file moved to platform-specific directory
Optimize Jackett search (use 'all' endpoint or run indexers in parallel)
Use ruff as linter (reformatted whole code base)
GeoIP module gracefully handles missing geoip2fast dependency
clipboard module gracefully handles missing pyperclip dependency
Refactor torrents clients: use torrent hash as ID in Transmission
Use non-existent category during indexers loading from Jackett (speed up loading)
Refactored code to split into torrent, search, ui modules
